CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Route Efficiency ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Route Efficiency  is Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Route Efficiency ?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Route Efficiency  is Damage/Loss Rate .

SRP.Q: On the Damage/Loss Rate , is the point for Villa-Bradford inside or outside the point for Williams Ltd?
SRP.A: On the Damage/Loss Rate , the point for Villa-Bradford is outside the point for Williams Ltd.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Villa-Bradford?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue}, while the weakest aspect is{ Service Coverage Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue, label {Williams Ltd} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Service Coverage Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Service Coverage Rate, label {Villa-Bradford} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Williams Ltd on the Damage/Loss Rate  in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Williams Ltd on the Safety dimension is {52}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Villa-Bradford on the Damage/Loss Rate  in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Villa-Bradford on the Safety dimension is {56}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label Williams Ltd across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of Williams Ltd across all dimensions is {58}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Villa-Bradford across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of Villa-Bradford across all dimensions is {42}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Route Efficiency
SC.A: The average value of Route Efficiency  is {55.5}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Williams Ltd
SC.A: The average value of Williams Ltd is {56.25}.

NF.Q: For Villa-Bradford in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores above 61? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.
NF.A: {Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue} is {64}

NF.Q: For Williams Ltd in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores below 48? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.
For Williams Ltd in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores between 48 and 61? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.
NF.A: {Service Coverage Rate} is {58}, {Damage/Loss Rate } is {52}, {Route Efficiency } is {51}

NC.Q: For Williams Ltd, which dimension has a higher score: Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue or Damage/Loss Rate ?
NC.A: {Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue} has a higher score than Damage/Loss Rate  for Williams Ltd.

NC.Q: On Damage/Loss Rate , which label has a higher score: Villa-Bradford or the Williams Ltd?
NC.A: {Villa-Bradford} has a higher score on Damage/Loss Rate  compared to Williams Ltd.

NC.Q: For Villa-Bradford, which dimension has a higher score: Damage/Loss Rate  or Service Coverage Rate or Route Efficiency ?
NC.A: {Route Efficiency } has a higher score for Villa-Bradford.

NC.Q: For Villa-Bradford, which dimension has a higher score: Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue or Route Efficiency  or Damage/Loss Rate ?
NC.A: {Fuel Cost as Rate of Revenue} has a higher score for Villa-Bradford.

MSR.Q: For Villa-Bradford, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Villa-Bradford most needs to improve its {Service Coverage Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Villa-Bradford}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Williams Ltd}.
